segments.text: Hi . I need to have my shoes repaired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s the matter with them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at the heels . They are slanting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , I can do it perfectly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 6 yuan . And I can make them as new as before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it ’ s too expensive . I can just give you 4 yuan . Or I ’ ll go to another B .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I ’ ll repair them for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take ? Could you repair them while I wait ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . They will be ready in a few minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! I ’ ll just sit here and wait .
segments.speaker: S1
